title: The Detective Boys and the Four Caterpillar Brothers

infobox.Title:: The Detective Boys and the Four Caterpillar Brothers
infobox.Japanese title:: 探偵団と青虫4兄弟  (Tantei-dan to Aomushi Yon-kyoudai)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Miwako Sato  Shinichi Kudo
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Junko Noda as Keiichi Mitsui  Toshihiko Kojima as Senkichi Matsuura  Tomoe Hanba as Fujishi  Ryuichi Horibe as Taxi driver  Osamu Hosoi as Minoru Yoshikawa

sections.Situation: Ayumi and the Detective Boys see an olive tree, on which lives a family of caterpillars. In the same area there is a murder, and a boy, despite having seen the face of the murderer, makes no statement to the police. Conan, after talking with the boy, is unable to understand why the boy does not want to talk to the authorities.
